lead_paragraph: It is three years since Poland said a bold "No" to Adolf Hitler. It was the first "No" that Hitler had ever heard. In eighteen days of savage fury he believed he had stamped out Poland. Now in the fourth year of the war Poland, armed and steadfast, unconquered and indomitable, still confronts him.
